def gcd(a,b):
	if (a==0 or b==0):
		return max(a,b)
	else:
		if (a>b):
			return gcd(a%b,b)
		else:
			return gcd(a,b%a)
def f(a,b):
	if b==1:
		return "Yes"
	else:
		g=gcd(a,b)
		if (g==1):
			return "No"
		else:
			return f(a,b/g)
for t in range(int(raw_input())):
	a,b=map(int,raw_input().split())
	print f(a,b)
